PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A new series of PBDTT-DPP-TPD random terpolymers containing two different electron - deficient units ( DPP and TPD ) were synthesized to produce polymers with complementary and broad light absorption from 400 to 900 nm.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PBDTT |
| DPP |
| TPD |

These are the three material properties mentioned in the paragraph:

* PBDTT (Poly[benzodithiophene-co-benzotriazole-co-thiophene])
* DPP (Dithienopyrrole)
* TPD (Thienylene-vinylene)

I removed "broad light absorption" from the list as it is not a material property, but rather a characteristic of the materials mentioned.
